author: Erin Doherty
title: Zelensky: 1,300 Ukrainian soldiers have been killed in "war of annihilation"
description: Russian forces are intensifying their campaign of aggression against Ukraine.
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Saturday that approximately 1,300 Ukrainian soldiers have been killed by Russian forces in what he is calling a "war of annihilation," according to the Newâ€¦ [+1827 chars]
